casebody.data:
IN RE: Maud Edwin Elliot INGRAM 431P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018

Maud Edwin Elliot Ingram, For Ingram, Maud Edwin Elliot.

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of N.C.

Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for the State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of February 2018 by Petitioner for Full Evidentiary Hearing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
